exceptions.exn: In environment cn : nid pts, others : seq nid Hnin : cn \ otin pts Puniq : uniq pts d : dstatelet C : TPCCoh d s : dynamic id H : find st (getLocal cn d) = Some s The term "None" has type "option ?A" while it is expected to have type "heap".
The LHS of H (find st (getLocal cn d)) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: unfold dyn_tp in *. intro H. assert (getLocal cn d <> None). { rewrite H. simpl. congruence. } destruct (getLocal cn d) as [x|] eqn:HX. * rewrite HX in H. simpl in H. congruence. * inversion H.
